bosk.block.zoo.debugging#

Blocks for pipeline debugging.

Package Contents#

Classes#

FitLambdaBlock

Base block, the parent of every computation block.

TransformLambdaBlock

Transform-Lambda Block that executes some function at the fit stage
class bosk.block.zoo.debugging.FitLambdaBlock(function, inputs)#

Bases: bosk.block.base.BaseBlock

Base block, the parent of every computation block.

Block has meta information, that defines the inputs and outputs as well as block execution properties, and slots which are unique for each block instance and can be used to connect different block between each other.

Main block methods are: fit(…) and transform(…). Both accept dictionaries as input, transform(…) returns a dictionary with output data.

Parameters:

  • function (Callable) –

  • inputs (Sequence[str]) –

meta#

Meta information of the block. May be shaped between different blocks. If the meta information cannot be specified at the class definition step, DynamicBlockMetaStub should be used as a stub, and then redefined at the initialization step.

slots#

Block slots of type BlockSlots, made dynamically at the initialization. Slots are unique for the block instance.

meta :bosk.block.base.BlockMeta#
fit(inputs)#

Fit the block on the given input data.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) – Block input data for the fitting stage.

Returns:

Self.

Return type:

FitLambdaBlock

transform(inputs)#

Transform the given input data, i.e. compute values for each output slot.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) – Block input data for the transforming stage.

Returns:

Outputs calculated for the given inputs.

Return type:

bosk.block.base.TransformOutputData

class bosk.block.zoo.debugging.TransformLambdaBlock(function, inputs)#

Bases: bosk.block.base.BaseBlock

Transform-Lambda Block that executes some function at the fit stage and bypasses input ad the transform stage.

Dynamically specifies the meta information.

Parameters:

  • function (Callable) – Function to execute at the transform stage.

  • inputs (Sequence[str]) – List of input slot names.

Input slots#

Fit inputs#

The fit step is bypassed.

Transform inputs#

  • inputs[0]: Data array 0.

  • …

  • inputs[n]: Data array n.

Output slots#

  • inputs[0]: Data array 0.

  • …

  • inputs[n]: Data array n.

meta :bosk.block.base.BlockMeta#
fit(_inputs)#

The block bypasses the fit step.

Parameters:

_inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) –

Return type:

TransformLambdaBlock

transform(inputs)#

Transform the given input data, i.e. compute values for each output slot.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) – Block input data for the transforming stage.

Returns:

Outputs calculated for the given inputs.

Return type:

bosk.block.base.TransformOutputData
